_header: I wot well soon of me thus wilt thou think
_description: Against extravagance in dress, an extract from Hoccleve’s de Regimine Principum, st. 58-73

BodLauMis735.First Lines:
I wate wele sone of me þus wilt þou thinkThis ald doted
                    gresell hold hym wyse…
BodLauMis735.Last Lines:
…The same get wold vp be take and vsydAnd all þe costlew
                    owtrage refusid
BodLauMis735.Attributed Title:
Of pridd & of waste clothyng of lordis mene which ich a ȝens her
                    astate (f. 67)
BodLauMis735.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Queene Elizabethes Achademy, etc.
EETS
         e.s. 8 (1869); repr. 1973: 105-8.
